posts.post_content:
Whose Ben?

Franklin of course

Pick up a beautiful Marquard Follow through graded SGC 35.  The card features an OLD MILL reverse

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/37542/marquard-ft-om-hof[/IMG]

If Rube wasn't blowing his nose on a windy day, the card would grade much higher.  Great eye appeal regardless on this fine SGC 35.

Be the first to offer $100 and the card is yours.

Be the second to offer $100 and receive a full refund.:D
:( Darn, nice pick up some one :)
